data.name: RIFT - Laethys' Indulgence Power Pack
data.detailed_description:
Pick up this powerful pack and you’re golden!



  • Laethys Broodling Mount
  • Golden Perceiver (VFX Useable)
  • 500,000 Bonus Loyalty
  • Packmaster’s Reward Cache
data.about_the_game:
Pick up this powerful pack and you’re golden!



  • Laethys Broodling Mount
  • Golden Perceiver (VFX Useable)
  • 500,000 Bonus Loyalty
  • Packmaster’s Reward Cache
data.short_description: Pick up this powerful pack and you’re golden!
data.supported_languages:
French*, German*, English*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce FX 5900, ATI/AMD Radeon X300, Intel GMA X4500 or better.
  • DirectX®: 9.0c, June 2010 update
  • Hard Drive: 15.0 GB available
  • Sound: DirectX 8.1 compliant card
  • Other: Broadband internet connection (DSL, cable modem or other high speed connection)
